Package com.stormpath.sdk.query

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Criteria<T extends Criteria<T>>
    A Criteria instance represents one or more Criterion (conditions) that are used to customize query results.
    Criterion
    A Criterion is an individual condition (restriction) to apply to a Criteria query.
    EqualsExpressionFactory
    An EqualsExpressionFactory creates equals Criterion for specific resource properties.
    Options
    An Options instance represents one or more customizations to apply when retrieving Resources.
    StringExpressionFactory
    An StringExpressionFactory creates String conditions (equals, startsWith, etc) for specific resource properties.
